SEARCH
Package Util

Class SafeScanner

java.lang.Object
Util.SafeScanner
public class SafeScanner extends Object
Utility class for safe and validated input handling from the console. Provides methods to ensure robust input validation for integers, strings, and passwords.

  • Method Details

    • getValidatedIntInput

      public static int getValidatedIntInput(Scanner scanner, String prompt, int min, int max)
      Prompts the user for an integer input within a specified range.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner instance to read input.
      prompt - The message to prompt the user.
      min - The minimum allowed value.
      max - The maximum allowed value.
      Returns:
      A validated integer input within the range.

    • getValidatedStringInput

      public static String getValidatedStringInput(Scanner scanner, String prompt, int maxLength)
      Prompts the user for a string input with validation for length and illegal characters.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner instance to read input.
      prompt - The message to prompt the user.
      maxLength - The maximum allowed length of the string.
      Returns:
      A validated string input.

    • getValidatedStringInput

      public static String getValidatedStringInput(Scanner scanner, String prompt, List<String> validInputs)
      Prompts the user for a string input from a predefined list of valid options.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner instance to read input.
      prompt - The message to prompt the user.
      validInputs - A list of valid string inputs.
      Returns:
      A validated string input matching one of the valid options.

    • getStrongPassword

      public static String getStrongPassword(Scanner scanner, String prompt)
      Prompts the user to input a strong password.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner instance to read input.
      prompt - The message to prompt the user.
      Returns:
      A validated strong password.

    • readPasswordMasked

      public static String readPasswordMasked(Scanner scanner)
      Reads a password input from the console, masking the input.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner instance to read input.
      Returns:
      The entered password as a string.

    • readPasswordMasked

      public static String readPasswordMasked(Scanner scanner, String prompt)
      Reads a password input from the console with a prompt, masking the input.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner instance to read input.
      prompt - The message to prompt the user.
      Returns:
      The entered password as a string.
